theorem effective_matrix_tensor_elements: " (((i<((row_length M1)*(row_length M2))) \<and>(j < (length M1)*(length M2))) \<and>(mat (row_length M1) (length M1) M1) \<and>(mat (row_length M2) (length M2) M2) \<Longrightarrow> ((M1 \<otimes> M2)!j!i) = f (M1!(j div (length M2))!(i div (row_length M2))) (M2!(j mod length M2)!(i mod (row_length M2))))"
